member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.outputBaguette(System.String,System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Outputs the configuration of a baguette to the console.
member.param: The bread type of the baguette
An array of strings that contains all the fillings in the baguette
An array of strings that contains all the salads in the baguette

member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.getElementsInArray(System.String[])
member.summary:
VB.Net pre-allocates the memory of arrays with the default value of the type of array (e.g. making an string(2) will fill the 3 spaces with an empty string).
To properly count the amount of elements in an array, we can use this function.
member.param: The array to count the amount of elements in it
member.returns: The amount of elements inside the array

member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.getBaguetteSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Asks the user what bread size they would like to order
member.param: An optional parameter describing the currently selected bread size if they have one. If this exists, the program will ask if they wish to modify their bread size choice.

member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.getBread(System.String)
member.summary: Asks the user what bread they would like to order
member.param: An optional parameter describing the currently selected bread if they have one. If this exists, the program will ask if they wish to modify their bread choice.

member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.getFillings(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the fillings for a baguette
member.param: The current fillings the user has

member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.getSalads(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets the salads for a baguette
member.param: The current salad the user has

member.name: M:_2020_igcse_prerelease.Project.createBaguette
member.summary: Gets the user to create a baguette
member.returns: A tuple that contains the following: - breadSize: The bread size the user has chosen - bread: The bread the user has chosen - fillings: An array of fillings the user has chosen - salads: An array of salads the user has chosen
